attributes.action: remove tom watson MP from parliment for his stance against free speech
attributes.additional_details: after tommy robinson run his panodrama video exsposing the bbc in their creation of fake news. tom watson mp demanded through letters that facebook google twitter and other social media outlets remove tommy and block him from their services. all he did was excercise and rightly so his right as a british citizen and a human being to free speech. as it stands youtube are the only site that has not removed tommy from their services. sign and show government we the people  will not be silenced.
attributes.background: tom watson MP. has proven by his actions he stands against the basic human right to free speech. he has petitioned social media providers to remove tommy robinson because he excercises his basic right to free speech. if his actions against tomy are any indicator he will do this to others

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs to be sacked.
